image_prompt: A Madhubani-style painting depicting a vibrant sun, rendered in bold, earthy colors, glaring angrily at a large, serene moon, its surface marred by dark, ash-like splotches.  The background features a simplified, stylized landscape of rolling hills and a small village with traditional huts, all in the characteristic Madhubani palette.
audio_text: सूरज, गुस्सा में, राख फेंका चाँद पे।  चाँद, शर्मा के छिप गया। (Sūraj, gussā meṁ, rākh pheṁkā chānd pe. Chānd, sharmā ke chhip gayā.)

image_prompt: A Warli painting showing a little girl, depicted in simple, white lines against a dark background, her hands clasped in prayer, looking up at a partially obscured moon. The moon is rendered with subtle shading to emphasize its imperfections, surrounded by stylized stars and a simplified night sky.  The scene is framed by Warli-style geometric patterns.
audio_text: छोटी बच्ची ने दुआ माँगी, चाँद वापस आ गया।  (Chhoṭī bachchī ne duā māṅgī, chānd vāpas ā gayā.)

image_prompt: A Pattachitra-style illustration showcasing the moon, its surface now clearly showing dark spots but radiating a soft, gentle light. Farmers are happily harvesting crops under its glow, children play, and the overall scene is filled with warm, vibrant colors characteristic of Pattachitra art.  The moon is centrally positioned, its imperfections highlighted but not overshadowed by its radiance.
audio_text: अब चाँद सबको रोशनी देता है।  कलंक भी सुंदर है। (Ab chānd sabko roshanī detā hai. Kalanka bhī sundar hai.)
